and technology thought leadership-- all of which are increasingly important given Google's global reach. Internally, he will continue to act as an advisor to Larry Page and Sergey Brin . Commenting on these changes, Eric Schmidt said: We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time. By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. In my clear opinion, Larry Page is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come. It took me a couple of minutes... I don't take whatever happened with the band or with( his ex-wives) into the judging like some other people might have done. ( A jab at Simon Cowell ?) "I'm just bringing my Italian, I-know-how-to-work-a-room, Aunt Phyllis honesty with hopes to find some kids from America to take the stage," he prattled cheerfully.

measures to limit strikes and curtail absenteeism, according to a statement by the UILM labor union on its website today. About 94 percent of the workers took part in the ballot that ended late yesterday. We're happy the majority of workers at Mirafiori has understood Fiat's commitment to transform it into a plant with an international reach, Sergio Marchionne , 58, said in an e-mailed statement today. "We're happy because workers with their vote showed they have confidence in their future. Our plan for this plant is very ambitious."

The detectives have a never-ending list of suspects to investigate after a murder occurs on "Castle" ( ABC at 10), particularly because the victim had just won the lottery. said David Letterman . "Being pummeled?" Anderson Cooper said. "I don't recommend it. I'd never been hit in the head before." He described the scene, saying, People came from all around, surrounding us, punching us, kicking us, trying to rip the clothes off my female producer. It was weird. And we were lucky, frankly.... I would start to slap back and then realize this is going to make it worse. My adrenline was pumping so much. I've never really been in a fight like this or attacked by a mob like this. I thought I was saying calm down, as if they could understand what I was saying. substantial evidence of an active Iraqi programme to produce weapons of mass destruction, but Mr. Rumsfeld believed that the site near the Iranian border presented the best chance to prove they existed before the war began.
